website_summaries.verdict: Great gift idea for Scrabble players who appreciate a higher-end version of the game. Solid wood frame, elegant gold leaf lettering, and rotating board for multiple players.
pros: Lazy Susan turntable and locking grid improve game play
Attractive wooden frame gives high-end appearance
Includes storage space in bottom layer
cons: Quality of board and tiles does not justify higher price point
Some tile lettering is offset, wears off quickly
Gold on brown contrast difficult to read

customer_reviews.title: Bad glue job
customer_reviews.text: I just received this game and I was very disappointed. I knew there were some bad reviews before I had ordered it, but decided to go ahead with it anyway since there were so many better reviews. As soon as I open the package I noticed the messy glue job all over the board. I haven't checked other things but the letters on the tiles were bright and legible. If I can't see the workmanship what's the point of paying extra?
customer_reviews.author: David Jang

customer_reviews.title: Sent It Back
customer_reviews.text: The overall construction of the game felt cheap — certainly not worth over $100. Two of the dividers in the storage area were loose (falling out) due to the glue not adhering properly. The game surface under the tile grid is just glued down paper that looked like it would curl up around the edges before long. The letter tiles are not engraved — just printed onto the wood. The tile bag is too small for adult hands to easily reach into to grab tiles. I expected a premium product for that price and was very disappointed. Returned right away.
customer_reviews.author: W. Koep

customer_reviews.title: The Real Review
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what's with the negative reviews of this item. It's exactly what I wanted - a very sturdy Scrabble board with grids in the board so the tiles line up and don't slide, and the board swivels (as long as it's on a flat surface). And I have no issue with being able to read the letters on the tiles. You spend this kind of money on a Scrabble board - you want professionalism, and that's what I got with this set. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Waters

customer_reviews.title: Scrabble deluxe not so deluxe
customer_reviews.text: Used the game twice and the board is falling apart, the letters are faded on some tiles and some tiles are smLler than others. I paid a lot of money for this game and I feel like I was ripped off:(
customer_reviews.author: Francine White

customer_reviews.title: BAD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed in this product. At almost a hundred dollars you'd think that this would be a quality board, but it isn't. Immediately after opening it, I noticed tape from the game was not properly glued down to the wooden board! I tried pushing it down with my nail, but it didn't help. I've never sent a product back, but think this sadly will be going. Really a shame so close to christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Zero issues,  worth the $$.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the entire family since we lost ALL of our old board games last year in a flood that destroyed our finished basement. Scrabble is one of my favorite games and trying to find a descent board anymore without paying a fortune is hard. Read MANY reviews and was apprehensive about this one but thought I would try and see. Very happy I did! No excessive glue across the board, no warped tiles or broken pieces. Everything showed up perfect! 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: LDYJMH

customer_reviews.title: Truly not a "deluxe" game - not worth $100
customer_reviews.text: When we opened the game, at least 5 of the squares on the board were covered with excess strips and globs of glue. The top board is not square and overhangs the bottom board by a quarter of an inch. the turntable does not turn smoothly. I am very disappointed as this was an anniversary gift and certainly not worth the $100. I will be contacting the seller to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Courtenay

customer_reviews.title: Looks great until you look closely :(
customer_reviews.text: Great concept. Poor delivery. Lack of attention to detail on construction. Adhesive felt inserts crooked. Letters are not carved into tiles. Our original scrabble board from the 80s uses real wood & times are engraved. This needs to be a deluxe edition with high end construction & materials even at the cost of increased price. Missed the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Brent7557

customer_reviews.title: Board Game Huge Hit at the holidays!!
customer_reviews.text: The deluxe Wooden Scrabble Edition with the rotating game board was a huge hit at our house during the Thanksgiving holidays. The grandkids had so much fun, they asked to borrow the game to take to their other grandparent's house later in the day. We are planning on taking the Scrabble game to the Christmas festivities and in the end, taking it to our condo In Missouri for summer time fun!! One of the best features was the board mounted on a lazy susan type swivel, making it easy for all players to see the words already played and the available extra word score spaces. We also ordered a Scrabble word dictionary to use while playing the game.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne C.

customer_reviews.title: The build is worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: The quality on this is solid. Sorry to the OCD folk who find issue with a few drops of glue overspray on the face of the board: sure, those drips exist but they are barely visible. This board is worth the $100. I say Go For It: this version is a non-eyesore to have sitting out as much as you would like. We also enjoy the wooden tiles, the four wood tile racks, etc. It all feels like a good quality Scrabble Set. Make sure you also order the Scrabble Dictionary to go along with all of this, if you don’t already have an edition.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken unfortunately. Not worth $100. Not constructed as strongly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree H.

customer_reviews.title: This item was just as described.
customer_reviews.text: It was a little heavier than I expected, but had all the features of a deluxe set - turntable, and raises around the letters. I felt that this was important, as I, and most of the people I play with are in our mid to late eighties, and tend to clumsily knock over letters in sets without this protection. It was somewhat heavier than expected, but that was because of many good features, such as places underneath to store the letters. It was actually a gift, and the person I gave it to liked it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth S.

customer_reviews.title: This game board swivels.
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived nicely packed. The game board, letter racks and letters are made of wood. The board has grooves so your letters stay in place - no need to worry about adjusting the squares while you play. Game also comes with a hardcover score booklet, pencil and a small glass sand timer. The game board swivel nicely for better viewing. The game board looks beautiful out on display and is made for long term use. Definitely well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KIMMIE

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my sister's birthday! We grew up playing scrabble on my parent's rotating scrabble board that we have had for well over 40 years and she wanted one similar to that. This board exceeded expectations for workmanship and beauty. It is a bit heavy, but it is great to just leave out for display so you don't have to lug it around. You will never need another board!
customer_reviews.author: BETH TANNER

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what Scrabble lovers will want
customer_reviews.text: This is great product. I cannot imagine what happened to our 50-year old set when we just moved, but we needed to replace it and this one is better than our old one. One corner had a nick in it but that does not affect play. The turntable is smooth-turning, and the storage area inside (or underneath) holds everything. I'm glad we spent the money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lifelong Reader

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, poorly crafted.
customer_reviews.text: This game was a disappointment. At $100 I expected a high quality giftable Scrabble set. In reality the paper of the board itself and the grid on top was poorly glued so it was bubbled and dis-colored. Also, unlike the plastic turntable boards, this turntable doesn’t raise the board up above the height of the tile trays, so it doesn’t help with table space, yet the board w box is so tall it puts the board at an awkward viewing height. (If the board spun on top of the box it would be much better.) Back this goes.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Dweller

customer_reviews.title: Good looking scrabble board
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking board, with internal storage. It rotates easily and keeps the letters in place. For anyone who likes to keep a game going, it is attractive enough to leave on the table. It seemed a little pricey and I put off buying it for a long time, but am very happy with it now that I have it.
customer_reviews.author: L inda

customer_reviews.title: Ehh better than plastic
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad. Not as nice as I would have liked for over $100. Tiles are cheaply printed instead of being engraved. The actual playing surface appears to be one big sticker on top of the wood. There are several places were there are glue globs from when the grid was placed on top. Nice looking from a far though, just feels like a cheap nice set...
customer_reviews.author: TRGil

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this version is absolutely beautiful. Bought this for my 10 year old niece so she can have a great board to grow up with and have when she’s older. The craftsmanship is seriously amazing. It makes the game so much better!!
customer_reviews.author: Laur

customer_reviews.title: I could be really beautiful, but I miss the finish that I would ...
customer_reviews.text: It could be really beautiful, but I miss the finish that I would expect from a deluxe edition. The top layer is glued on the wood, but it's not completely straight. I also found some bits of glue and small dents or cuts (however this could be due to the transport). The wooden letters are gorgeous, but they are not all the same shape, some have a very visible en big difference in size.The booklet, the rules, the pouch and the built in lazy Susan are all great. Overall I expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Robbe Van Thielen

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: I finally opened the box it is missing tiles, scratched, what a joke! It was used before! Do not bother buying!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa j. Trummell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Board
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my Scrabble fanatic wife who really loves it due to tiles staying in-place and ability to rotate. Very nice color, wood and accessories, etc. The only draw back is putting away the tiles after play. Instead of just folding up the board and sliding pieces into bag, we now have to dump tiles either onto table or pick each tile one by one and place into bag. I would have rated 5 stars if not for that one issue.
customer_reviews.author: joel rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a high quality Scrabble set, this is not it. It looks great in the pictures but in reality it is a very poorly finished set. We found letters were unevenly printed, tile sizes varied and there was felt missing in the interior. The board edges were curled and wrinkled and the finish on the tile racks was very rough. This was not as good as a standard Hasbro set. The concept is good, but the execution is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: cagster

customer_reviews.title: Expected more for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift for my wife. It was gorgeous until i startes looking closer at it. The stickers put on the top where misaligned ans for this price you'd think they'd do a little better than stickers. Also, the felt that lines the pockets that hold the trays was miscut and misaligned. For the price, this thing should be pristine. The tiles are the same tiles you get with the cheapest scrabble game just stained to match the stain of the board. Many corners were cut in the production of this. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Does not close
customer_reviews.text: We were SO excited about this game, having searched for months for this wooden turntable. There were so few available that we decided to buy it. When it arrived though, the top does not fit on the bottom of the board, thus not closing properly. It is upsetting that for 150.00 it is not in perfect condition. UGH.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Tobia

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a Christmas gift for two close relatives along with the hard covered Scrabble Dictionary. It seems like every time I call them, morning noon or night they are playing. Their first language is Polish, although they speak English. A great way to really improve English for them and keep them busy at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: jomama

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not useable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful beautiful beautiful! I bought this as a Christmas gift for my parents. They are avid scrabble players. While it is beautiful they don't use it as much as they want to. After opening it they said that it has a heavy chemical smell. They had left it out on their table for over a week to air out, but to no avail. So they keep it to look at and not use. I feel as though I got them a useless present.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy quality and fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: A step up from the lower-quality board games - for those who take their board games seriously. 😉
customer_reviews.author: K. McIltrot

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality wood Scrabble boards run up to around $250. At only $109 this is quite a bargain for a nicely constructed wood board with posh interior and wood letters. I especially liked that the letters were a dark wood, as opposed to the typical, bland pieces that are so common. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews that the quality is not up to par, but I find it very nice! Beautiful board (gets lots of compliments) and outside of one or two tiles where the gold is missing on part of a letter, it's a great piece! Best parts: The table rotates for each player, everything is stored inside the table AND the tiles don't slide around on top!
customer_reviews.author: SJB

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of concerned after purchasing due to other negative reviews, but I am more than pleased with this product. Packaging was not an issue at all. The game is heavy, beautiful wood without knicks or scratches. Its turntable operates smoothly and as advertised and looks much more expensive than it actually was in comparison to other deluxe scrabble games. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tallarico

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve read some of the other reviews so I was expecting some minor imperfections but couldn’t find any...this is a stunning scrabble set! I’m giving it as a Christmas gift to my husband and I cannot wait for him to open it! This set is beautifully made with gorgeous attention to detail. Very much worth the money. We will get years of enjoyment out of this set I’m sure😃
customer_reviews.author: Paula K. Brand

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about spending so much on a scrabble. But I'm glad I did. The lazy Susan (turning wheel) is steady. And I had no issues with the rotation. Some reviews mentioned a bad glue job, mine came in perfect condition. I love it. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: fizzy

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is just an absolutely perfect gift for a scrabble lover. I purchased it for my dad for Christmas. He was so impressed with it that I'll never be able to find him a better gift.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jane

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Scrabble board
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift (for my gf/ SO), and I must say this is actually nicer than I was expecting. Yes, there were a few very minor defects. I say again, minor... She was ecstatic when it arrived. It is nice that all parts store in the "lazy Susan" base. I will buy again, if I ever need to... but I doubt I will.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gaebler

customer_reviews.title: Nice board. We've used it several times and have ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice board. We've used it several times and have had no issues. Board is big and pieces stay in play. Rotating board makes it nice and easy to turn the board. Pieces are easy to read so must have been upgraded since previous reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that isn't perfect is removing the pieces when you are done playing ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hooked on scrabble. This game design is fabulous. The only thing that isn't perfect is removing the pieces when you are done playing - you can't just swipe them off but the fact that the pieces don't move around during the game is worth the extra effort removing them when you're done.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Mohs

customer_reviews.title: What You See Is What You Get
customer_reviews.text: I order this back in March and was finally able to get the family to play it on Easter. The craftsmanship and finish was undoubtedly noticeable as it received several compliments. It made me feel good about my purchase! Unlike several other reviews, there were no messy glue job or scratched/chipped wood. The rotation worked perfectly, the scorebook was sturdy and bag to hold the letters was more than deep enough to contain them all. I could go on, but I think you get the point. If you are looking for a quality and functional Scrabble board, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Colorme Rae

customer_reviews.title: I like it very much!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift from my husband. I started playing scrabble with my father when I was a kid and am now playing with my children. This is a nice board. It stores everything inside and even comes with a score pad. The color of the board is different from my old one, so that was an adjustment. The only draw back is that the letters are printed in gold and the light glares off of them. It makes them a little more difficult to view. However, gold letters are pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Admiral Trench

customer_reviews.title: No complains, but not worth the pricetag
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers have complained about a "chemical smell" or the tiles being hard to read. Neither of these things was an issue for me; in our dimly lit apartment legibility was fine. I give it 4 stars though because it just doesn't feel like it's worth the $100 pricetag. $50 or $60 would have been more reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Zach C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Set.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice scrabble board. Our old board had been taken on numerous road and camping trips and has seen much better days. Was time for a new one. Very nice wood framed board with raised borders around the spaces to keep the tiles from drifting around. And it has a swivel base you don't have to strain your neck to look at it. The bag for the tiles could be a bit larger for those of us with big hands.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis J. Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Decent.. but questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: The outer part is wood but the actual game board looks cheap close up. It's like stickered on and paper. I do not expect it to be waterproof or anything but I would expect it to be durable. I'm thinking the plastic ones are more durable. It does look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kim. NYC Teacher & pet mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful board
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely beautiful board that is also very functional. Craftsmanship is very good though mine isn't entirely square meaning the bottom and top halves only properly set at a particular orientation but this isn't a big deal. The only thing I would add to make it better would be a latch to keep the two halves together.
customer_reviews.author: Devin F. Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Really a well made product.
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted one for a while. I found this on Amazon and she loves it. We have used it often. It's easy to turn, the tiles are well made and fit into slots so they don't move. An excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C

customer_reviews.title: Great game board
customer_reviews.text: The board I received had no issues of broken wood or glue showing. It is worth the money, for the most part. I feel the range is better at 50-60 dollars. But this board makes a nice coffee table conversation piece, literally.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Jerome

customer_reviews.title: it could be nicer for the money spent
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, It is a very pretty board! The letters are easy to read and place on the board into the ridges for the letters. The materials are on the bit of the cheap side. The letter bag is terrible, I made a new one. The score pad is so small that you cannot read the scores unless you have vision like Superman. And so, we replaced the score pad too. The storage is nice, and it is certainly much better than a regular scrabble board, but for the money, yeah, I was a bit disappointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: CMac -Amazon Addict!

customer_reviews.title: A little heavier
customer_reviews.text: This one is a little heavier than the conventional scrabble board, but it looks good and the lazy-susan design is a plus. Great gift for the scrabble lover.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Costly for a game.  Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: During quarantine, I think all the board games went up in price. This one was was a bit costly, but looks great out of the box. Costs too much to let people play with it though.
customer_reviews.author: KHarr

customer_reviews.title: Love the board, slightly off in finishing
customer_reviews.text: Functions the way it does. Was bought as a birthday gift and it served the purpose. Taking a star off because it was supposed to be a "deluxe" board but there are some glue marks which are visible and the edges are not as smoothened out as they should be for a $100 board! Great job in packaging though!
customer_reviews.author: Raghav Iyengar

customer_reviews.title: very good. However I would have liked to see only ...
customer_reviews.text: Over all, very good. However I would have liked to see only the top board half rotate, and the bottom half be the stationary base. That way, you could set your tile blocks close to the base and not half to move them to rotate the board.
customer_reviews.author: bobdone

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My parents have been on a big Scrabble kick, and this was the perfect gift! The rotating board and large, light-on-dark tiles make it easy to see and the grooves make it easy for my mom's shaky hands to lay her word down without messing up the whole board. Very classy looking!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Scrabble lover!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for any Scrabble fan!! Ridged squares hold the letters in place and the boards easily spins for easy access by every player. I love it!! Well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: catbert

customer_reviews.title: Thought quality would be better at this price...
customer_reviews.text: I am less than pleased with the quality of this product. Have seen others that were much better constructed and looked higher quality. The print on the tiles is stamped on, not etched in the wood. The quality of the wood in general could be much nicer and I believe should be for the price. If I'd seen this in a store I would not buy it at this price...
customer_reviews.author: Cheri J Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Scrabble Deluxe Edition
customer_reviews.text: The game arrived early and in perfect condition. Very well made, and the included score pads are a nice touch. A little pricey, but it is a nice set. Recommended if you are a Scrabble fan.
customer_reviews.author: jwscott23

customer_reviews.title: Top of the Line
customer_reviews.text: We've played on this for many times. I can see where the quality can be and not. The tile hilders are nothing much special, kind of lightweight. The other annoyance is the table is kind of high, so if you're short it can be an issue. Otherwise a good cfrat piece.
customer_reviews.author: Mother Knows Best

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Should last for a long time. Read the reviews. Looked at all versions of boards. Had none of the issues mentioned by others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted/made
customer_reviews.text: This is just what it is portrayed as...a well made product. My daughter loves that the base turns and the tiles stay put!
customer_reviews.author: cdh

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Now I can host Scrabble games with a little class. No fear of accidently bumping and messing up the layout, each tile space has a lip that hold the tiles in place.
customer_reviews.author: Papa McCain

customer_reviews.title: Quality and materials cheap
customer_reviews.text: Overall disappointed. In reading the reviews, I was expecting a better quality materials. Some of the letter tiles a noticeably smaller than the others. It took one game for everyone to learn which tile is an “M” etc ...
customer_reviews.author: Peter H.

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy with it. Thought it was going to be slightly better quality. It has some minor paint and glue issues but you only notice after looking very close.
customer_reviews.author: louis F

customer_reviews.title: Best scrabble board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself for a gift exchange (expected to take home what I bought because my family always gets subpar gifts for our gift exchange). My wife ended up with it...win! However, she traded it away after the fact for something we have probably thrown away already. Still a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Wieland

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful. However the top does not secure to the ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother and I are very avid scrabble players. I purchased this for her for Christmas. It's beautiful. However the top does not secure to the bottom well and if you move it but don't grab the entire game the top comes off very easily. I love it but I wish the top was secured better.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: It's worth the money as far as I'm concerned. I was unable to detect any flaws in the manufacturing that would give cause for concern. The score book is very nice. I wish I could find additional score pads for it.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Scrabble Aficionados
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful set! I was disappointed that the manual doesn't contain the acceptable two-letter word list. The quality of the board and pieces are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Christy N.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a well made, quality Scrabble game set as a Christmas gift. My wife was impressed so much that we keep it out on the counter. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Slight damage ... disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: A nice set but it was slightly damaged. Seems to have glue on one of the squares. Too bad it was a gift for someone for Christmas ...
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly O.

customer_reviews.title: ... keeps tiles in place and the rotating base are great features, along with the containment space under the ...
customer_reviews.text: The grid that keeps tiles in place and the rotating base are great features, along with the containment space under the board. If you enjoy the game, this is the Best way to play it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Arrived 100% intact. Classy looking, great quality. Now if only I can find someone to beat me lol
customer_reviews.author: To The Max"Bax"

customer_reviews.title: I like the product ok
customer_reviews.text: I like the product ok, but it could really use some more attention to detail. the graphics are just a printed sticker that is not applied perfectly. the interior lining doesn't lay or stick just right. the lazy susan leave a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great board, very good construction.
customer_reviews.text: Great item, quality is very good. Nice to have wood and not plastic or cardboard for board or tiles. Turntable is a great feature for a scrabble board, along with the raised edges to keep tiles in place.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The board was beautiful, BUT it was missing the tiles so what good is scrabble with no tiles!? I returned it, hopefully the next one will have them.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M Betts

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well built.
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and beautifully done. My husband was very excited to be gifted this & cannot wait time play my brother to maintain his crown.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking set
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christimas gift for my daughter's family. Now we can all play scrabble and it is nice enough to leave out on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Covell

customer_reviews.title: Such a beautiful game
customer_reviews.text: I really love it and have received compliments on it's beauty. Very well made. I'm quite please with the purchase and may gift one to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: LaTrina Blair

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe Indeed!!
customer_reviews.text: A must for Scrabble "Snobs" like my wife and I who won't play on line. Worth every penny. Love the rotating deck and the fact that the tiles do not move because of the separations. Great storage under the deck as well.
customer_reviews.author: claptun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great game board...love the fact that you can spin the game to face each person
customer_reviews.author: Michael Woolman

customer_reviews.title: I lover it I love it I love it
customer_reviews.text: I lover it I love it I love it. I have been playing scrabble since I have been about 8 years old. It is fancy shchmancy. A bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E. Sykes

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My parents can't stop playing. :) Beautiful quality! Can't say enough great things about this game!
customer_reviews.author: W.R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The game is lovely ... but didn't like the dark wood letter tiles with gold embossed letters. I am short and my angle viewing the tiles resulted in light reflecting off of some parts of the letters and other parts were totally dark rendering them difficult to read. I was forced to buy a new set of regular letter tiles (light wood and black lettering). I purchased a vintage set which were very nice but cost about $17 then add shipping.
customer_reviews.author: mcapja

customer_reviews.title: ELEVATES the entire experience1
customer_reviews.text: ...We had started playing board games in March, (needless to explain why), and found ourselves enjoying Scrabble so much, we decided to upgrade from the original board game. The turntable design makes it much more expeditious, and the sand timer insures fewer marathon sessions. Wish it included a Scrabble dictionary!
customer_reviews.author: ultimatestyle lady

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful game, hearty and sturdy tabetop game.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful board and pieces. My only complaint is the box it was shipped in was entirely too big for the game.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not a good board.
customer_reviews.text: Poor craftsmanship the wood was coming apart and the board was not seated correctly but the return was fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Crites

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best scrabble board I have owned. It is very elegant and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo J.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I was looking forward to a nice quality board game. This was cheaply made, basically a paper board which can tear or get ruined w a fingernail. Gross glue marks throughout....got it today. It will be returned today.
customer_reviews.author: JAlvarado

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This thing is beautiful. It is larger than the normal game but so much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmie

customer_reviews.title: High quality board
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful to play Scrabble with a high quality board and other parts. The letters don't move around, and the board rotates. Wonderful! This will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: JP Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the pricey side, but a beautiful heirloom game.
customer_reviews.author: John P Josey

customer_reviews.title: Great Scrabble Set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice board that rotates with all needed for a good game of Scrabble.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtster

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It's great to be able to store everything in the board. The tiles stay nicely in the holders and in the spots on the board. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Baneeners

customer_reviews.title: I love it but was disappointed that the letters are inconsistently ...
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted this Scrabble set forever and decided to treat myself to it last year. I love it but was disappointed that the letters are inconsistently sized and centered on the tiles. It cheapens what is otherwise a very beautiful set.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: If you enjoy Scrabble, this is your board for life
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! Love the turntable. Love the security of the letters on the board. If you enjoy Scrabble, this is your board for life.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole43

customer_reviews.title: The board is very nice, sturdy and I have not had problems with ...
customer_reviews.text: I sure had a different experience than others. It was packaged well and protected on the ends so there was no damage. The board is very nice, sturdy and I have not had problems with the tiles. This is a really nice higher end scrabble game set up and is well made. It's actually a little nicer than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: MtnMolly

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a rip off..way too pricey considering the quality. Some of the board has areas that are bumpy and look like they jad a few drops of water soak in. Very bad quality considering the high price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really beautiful! Perfect for a gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my grandma, who is a wizard at scrabble but has used the same board game for decades. She loves how it swivels around for the players. It is such a beautiful board game, and a perfect present.
customer_reviews.author: Jerusha Vox

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting it to be this great. Smells freshly built, and makes the gaming experience more special. My only knock is that I didn’t realize it was a liftable cover- I thought it was hinged. Still, a priceless gift for a true scrabble enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Odufunade

customer_reviews.title: His mom told me he loved it. I called The Cloister to make sure ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter messaged me that my grandson started playing as soon as he got it. He had first played it during spring vacation at The Cloister on Sea Island in the lobby. His mom told me he loved it. I called The Cloister to make sure I would send him the exact game he had enjoyed so much. Later I received the first thank-you note he had ever written me by himself telling me he really liked it. He's nine and taught me to play Texas Hold-Em last Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: So, someone wished for the "Deluxe Scrabble Board", especially the turntable/lazy susan function. There were several vintage ones on e-bay, but Amazon is so much better I just went with it and got a new one. It turned out pretty well. We thought there was a malfunction with the tiles, but it turned out that I had misplayed a letter as a blank on the second play with this board. Can't remember what word I made though.
customer_reviews.author: ski9600

customer_reviews.title: You can't go back
customer_reviews.text: Once you play on this board, there's no going back. Not even to the semi-deluxe version I've had for 15 years. And the old maroon set? Puh-leeze. This is The Scrabble Board for anyone who loves the game.
customer_reviews.author: SueF

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The one that arrived today is beautiful and nice to use with the turntable and raised dividers between letter. I saw that some earlier reviews gave low points on quality. There were no quality issue with mine
customer_reviews.author: Hey Ma Look at Me

customer_reviews.title: Worth paying a little more.
customer_reviews.text: Nice version of Scrabble. Zero regrets for buying this upscaled version.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Tschogl

product_meta.title: Scrabble Deluxe Edition with Rotating Wooden Game Board
product_meta.description: This deluxe Scrabble edition allows you to enjoy Americas Favorite Word Game in style. This edition features a solid wood cabinet with mahogany finish and built-in lazy susan. The top of the cabinet features a deluxe foil-stamped Scrabble game board with raised grid to keep the Scrabble tiles in place when turning the cabinet. Lift the top off of the wood cabinet and you will find individual storage compartments for all of the premium game components. The 100 Scrabble tiles and 4 letter tile racks are solid wood with a mahogany finish to match the cabinet. These Scrabble tiles are stored in an embroidered fabric pouch with drawstring. The set also includes a hard cover foil-stamped scorebook with a pencil to record the results of your epic word battles. The set is completed by a sand timer with gold toned end caps for optional timing. This deluxe Scrabble set is sure to make a statement whether you are enjoying a challenging round of Scrabble or simply admiring this beautiful set as it sits on your coffee table. Game cabinet measures 15.75 x 15.75 x 3.00 inches and weighs 6 lbs 10 ounces with all components stored inside. The play field measures 14.25 x 12.75 inches. Scrabble letter tiles each measure 0.8125 x 0.6875 inches. Designed by WS Game Company in Massachusetts. Produced in China. Officially Licensed by Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Game cabinet is solid wood with mahogany finish and built-in lazy susan
Deluxe foil-stamped Scrabble game board with raised grid to hold the tiles in place when turning the cabinet
Remove game cabinet top to reveal built-in storage area that houses all of the premium game components
100 Easy-to-Read Mahogany finish Scrabble Letter Tiles and (4) Matching Scrabble Letter Tile Racks
Embroidered fabric Scrabble tile pouch with drawstring, hard cover foil-stamped scorebook with pencil, sand timer with gold-toned end caps, and playing rules

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars957 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
